Family Information and Discipline Code Book

p.span: The Clinton School District, the largest school district in Henry County, is home to 1,775 students, PK-12th grade. The district encompasses an early childhood program, elementary school, intermediate school, middle school, high school and technical school.

Fully accredited through the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education, the CSD provides an education that is both rigorous and customized. This combination meets students where they are, while also helping equip them to be prepared, highly-skilled and marketable in the 21st century.

A strong sense of Cardinal Pride exists beyond the walls of our schools, allowing for many unique community partnerships that support our students’ needs, as well as providing opportunities for real world application of learning.

img.style: display: block; margin: 0 auto; width: 45px; height: 51px
